sentences.sentence: The United Nations will act as guarantor of the peace settlement.
sentences.translation: 联合国将充当和平解决方案的保证人。

sentences.sentence: Someone thinking about acting as a guarantor should be clear what their obligations will be.
sentences.translation: 想做担保的人应该清楚他们将要承担的责任。

sentences.sentence: All of the obligations of the Guarantor hereunder shall be joint and several.
sentences.translation: 担保人在本担保书项下承担的所有义务均应是连带的。
